document_data.name: ''Jahlah''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''jahlah''''' (jah-LAH) was a small simplistic [[Zakhara|Zakharan]] [[drum]].{{Cite dragon/190/Sounds of Wonder & Delight}}
document_data.Description: A ''jahlah'' was a basic clay pot that was played by beating it with both hands. It could also be filled with small stones and used as a rattle.
document_data.History: The ''jahlah'' was found in the [[Southeast Zakhara|southeastern]] regions of the Land of Fate and was used primarily by fishermen and pearl divers.
